thread.section_title: Park Lane Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Improving
thread.title_full: Improving - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robert M
title: Improving
text: Stayed here annually for more than 5 years. Experience has varied from very good to poor. No serious complaints this year. Rooms are large and clean. Bathroom clean. Noisy fan half way during last night. But room was comfortable. Front desk staff not very pleasant or helpful - this is an annual expectation. No one looks happy working at the Park Lane.
